title: Dharti Ka Veer Yodha Prithviraj Chauhan
overview: Dharti Ka Veer Yodha Prithviraj Chauhan is an Indian historical drama broadcast on Star Plus. It portrays the life of Prithviraj Chauhan, the famous 12th-century ruler in India. The drama is based on Prithviraj Raso, the Apabhramsha poem by Chand Bardai.
